price: Да ли су они створили небеса и Земљу?! Не, него, они нису убеђени!
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
